meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6979.

div.div:
Elliot Yates game 5.
John Schultz game 1.

td.p: John Schultz, a computer programmer from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Elizabeth Scott-Jones, a budget analyst from Riverside, California
Elliot Yates, an opera producer from New York, New York (whose 4-day cash winnings total $65,000)

tr.td: WORLD OF WATER
SOLAR SYSTEM RHYME TIME
KIDDY LIT
"POP" STARS
THAT'S NO LADY
THAT'S MY WIFE
